ConfigurationGroup.title: Download Products
ConfigurationGroup.description: Configuration Settings For The Download Products Extension

EXTENSION_DOWNLOADPRODUCTS_ENABLED.title: Enable Download Products
EXTENSION_DOWNLOADPRODUCTS_ENABLED.description: Enable Or Disable The Download Products Extension

EXTENSION_DOWNLOADPRODUCTS_ORDERS_STATUS.title: Allowed Order Statuses
EXTENSION_DOWNLOADPRODUCTS_ORDERS_STATUS.description: Allow download with the following order statuses

EXTENSION_DOWNLOADPRODUCTS_MAX_DAYS.title: Maximum Days To Download
EXTENSION_DOWNLOADPRODUCTS_MAX_DAYS.description: Set number of days before the download link expires. 0 means no limit.

EXTENSION_DOWNLOADPRODUCTS_MAX_COUNT.title: Maximum Number Of Downloads
EXTENSION_DOWNLOADPRODUCTS_MAX_COUNT.description: Set the maximum number of downloads. 0 means no limit.
